ActorFrame.InitCommand:
%function(self)
wavestep_colors = {} wavestep_spells = { {0,42,1,'1:1 Wavestep','78909C'}, {42,51,1,'1:2 Lonesome hold','FFFFFF'}, {51,99,3,'1:3 Simple','1E88E5'}, {99,147,4,'1:4 Lay me down','1E88E5'}, {147,199,3,'1:5 For it is written','78909C'}, {199,247,5,'1:6 Displacer','EC407A'}, {247,311,2,'1:7 Dread','B71C1C'}, {311,377,6,'1:8 Cut myself','1E88E5'}, {377,409,0,'1:9 Doom','B71C1C'}, {412,425,9e9,'#:# Do not make any noise','000000'}, }
local function rgb(hex) return { tonumber('0x'..string.sub(hex,1,2))/255, tonumber('0x'..string.sub(hex,3,4))/255, tonumber('0x'..string.sub(hex,5,6))/255 } end
function colorized2021(n) local ret = {1,1,1,0} if n>=5 then ret[4] = -90 end if n==2 or n==6 then ret[2] = 0; ret[3] = 0; end if n==3 or n==7 then ret[1] = 0; ret[3] = 0; end if n==4 or n==8 then ret[3] = 0; end table.insert(wavestep_colors, ret) end
if table.getn(wavestep_spells) > 1 then local song = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong() song:SetNumSpellCards(table.getn(wavestep_spells)) song:ClearLabels() for i = 0, table.getn(wavestep_spells) - 1 do local a = wavestep_spells[i + 1] song:SetSpellCardTiming(i, a[1]-0.1, a[2]-0.1) song:SetSpellCardDifficulty(i, a[3]) song:SetSpellCardName(i, a[4]) song:AddLabel(a[1], a[4]) song:SetSpellCardColor(i, rgb(a[5])[1], rgb(a[5])[2], rgb(a[5])[3], 1) end else return false end
end
